version_description:
• Free new Celestial Dynamics preset and timbre pack
• Tempo is now a selective loading option
• Clearing all modulations can now be undone
• Improvements to path manipulation when locking in XY axis
• Improvements to legacy preset import correctness
• Tag and group text entry is now properly limited to 24 characters
• UI improvements for iPhone devices
• Fixes for looper when stopping recording with the record button
• Fix for overwriting user timbre not properly clearing the cached audio
• Fix for global settings not always persisting
